column1: iach is a word only appearing in compound names (cf. Examples). The word is commonly understood to be a Sindarin noun meaning meaning "ford" or "crossing".
column4: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 20 July 2011)
